TopicTitle: How do i turn off the yellow text?

Articles.Content: Hey guys, How do i turn off the yellow text? Like the "target" and "focus" text... it's really annoying when trying to make cinematics...... it doesnt go away even when UI is disabled.
You could use texture replacer to make it go away for good... or you could right click the body you are targeting and deselect it as a target.

I don't think you can in stock zekes. But I recall there's a cinematic mod out there that suppresses a lot of this. I don't recall the name though.

Cheers,

~Claw
If it is just for temporary then you can F2 to clean things up a bit.

as suggested - F2 removes all the HUD details. F4 removes all the targeting data (be sure to put it back or you'll be trying to approach your station too fast and smash in to it before you realise - not saying from experience what-so-ever-honest)
F2 doesn't hide the yellow text though.

If you are putting subtitles on your cinematic make it the same colour and font as the yellow text. Then you can make it as one of your Kerbals is saying it e.g.

Mission controll - "Jeb you are go for transfer to Duna"

Jeb - "Rodger, Target Duna."

Get what i mean?
